remarks: Decomposition of a vector into projections.  This formulation of ~ axpjpj avoids ~ pjhth .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-May-2014.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
pjpjpre.1 $e |- ( ph -> H e. CH ) $.
pjpjpre.2 $e |- ( ph -> A e. ( H +H ( _|_ ` H ) ) ) $.
pjpjpre $p |- ( ph -> A = ( ( ( projh ` H ) ` A ) +h ( ( projh ` ( _|_ ` H ) ) ` A ) ) ) $.
